```{r global, echo=FALSE}
```

- Time limit: 90 minutes. You can take any 90-minute window during that period.
- One attempt
- You must start before 10:29 pm to use the full 90 minutes.
  - After 10:29 pm, you can still take the exam, but the time allowed to you will be less than 90 minutes.
  - After 11:59 pm, you won't be able to make any attempt.
- A session will be automatically saved and terminated upon the time limit. Once you start, the timer won't stop even if you leave the exam page.
- Closed-book exam. No crib sheet allowed.
- 25 Multiple choice questions. 4 points per each question.
